name: Codebusters (BroReNata)
description:
Following with the Ludum Dare 47 theme of 'stuck in a loop' you play as Captain Byte and Pribit, who have had enough of their amateur coder's bad code and infinite loops. Take on 9 loops. Destroy the FOR and you destroy the loop!

Built with Godot and Aseprite.

Credits:

Music: https://soundcloud.com/storeboughtfood

Intro Animation: https://sworndevelopment.itch.io/godot-splash-boot-video
